title: Echoes of Vengeance
description: "Every scar tells a story." For Jamie, each one is a mark of survival-and a step closer to vengeance.Enter the dark and unforgiving streets of Scotland, where one man, Jamie, fights for justice, as much as he is in need of reclamation's of his humanity after a series of unending betrayals. Haunted by brutalities from the past, fueled by pain, Jamie rises like a phoenix from the ashes, determined to go toe-to-toe with his tormentors. Echoes of Vengeance is an enthralling tale of survival, redemption, and relentless justice.This is a novel for readers who enjoy raw emotion, edge-of-your-seat tension, and unforgettable characters personifying the fight for survival and hope.Fans of The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo or any Peaky Blinders-esque story will appreciate the high-stakes drama, palpable tension, and one unforgettable protagonist.
author: Aidan  Blackwood
